PITTSBURGH (KDKA) - Dogs (and cats, too) are more than man's best friend.
Experts say dog owners had more social support and fewer depressive symptoms during the pandemic.
During the pandemic, more people turned toward animals to help get them through the uncertainty.
Experts say we love our animals because they offer things that humans sometimes can't.
We take our dogs to the dog park the same way we take our children to the playground.
Many of us have both pets and children and in many ways treat them the same.
Their unconditional love helps us manage stress and anxiety.
We buy our pets toys and dress them up for the holidays.
